resources.string: TeslaFi obtains the data from your vehicle from the Tesla API. In order to connect to the API this application connects you directly to Tesla\'s website to authenticate and create an API token which TeslaFi will use to request data instead of your credentials.
Here are the Tesla tokens generated by this app. You can copy them from here and use them into other third-party apps. Most of third-party apps will accept the Owner API Token as login mean.
You token has been emitted less than 1 day ago, refresh is not needed for now
When the Owner API token expires, you can renew it using the button above. A new token will then be generated and you can replace the old one in your third-party applications.
Please choose an option below to provide TeslaFi with your Tesla API Refresh Token.
